content.text: Second Half Extra Time ends, Atlético de Madrid 1, Bayer 04 Leverkusen 0.

Penalty missed! Bad penalty by Stefan Kießling (Bayer 04 Leverkusen) right footed shot is just a bit too high. Stefan Kießling should be disappointed.
Goal!  Atlético de Madrid 1(3), Bayer 04 Leverkusen 0(2). Fernando Torres (Atlético de Madrid) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
